Class CreateGameSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.entwicklerpages.java.schoolgame.menu.CreateGameSlot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor, GameState

    public class CreateGameSlot
extends java.lang.Object
implements GameState, com.badlogic.gdx.InputProcessor
    4-Stufiger Wizard um ein neues Spiel zu beginnen.
